channel.title: AI on ssamot's heretical rumblings
channel.description: Recent content in AI on ssamot's heretical rumblings

item.title: Adversus ludii, adversus ludos
item.description: Quick self-bio I entered AI through games; I’ve started my PhD thinking roughly that if we manage to solve poker (or more generally, games of imperfection and/or incompleteness), we will manage to more or less solve the problem of AI; solving the problem of AI meant solving the problem of labour. Nobody would have to work, because machines would do all – just need to solve “the problem of games” and all we would end up doing is playing games.
